messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for balance inquiries.
How can I check the balance of my Call, SMS and Internet Data?
What codes do I use to check my call, SMS, and data balances?
How do I find out my remaining minutes, SMS, and data?
To check remaining SMS dial *111# @ Rs. 0.20 + tax. To check remaining Minutes dial *222# @ Rs. 0.20 + tax. To check remaining Internet dial *999# @ Rs. 0.20 + tax.
